m_szDocTitle: CONTAMINATED HYDROGEN CHARGING PREVENTING SYSTEM - HYUNDAI MOTOR COMPANY
m_szDocSumamry: Login Sign up Search Expert Search Quick Search Patents/Apps Non-Patent Literature SEARCH RESEARCH MPEP 2.0 TOOLS & RESOURCES ACCLAIM IP HELP Title: CONTAMINATED HYDROGEN CHARGING PREVENTING SYSTEM United States Patent Application 20140174588 Kind Code: A1 Abstract: A contaminated hydrogen charging preventing system that prevents contaminated hydrogen from being supplied to a vehicle. In particular, a sensor that is disposed in a charging pipe that charges a hydrogen tank of a vehicle with senses/detects contaminates in the hydrogen. Upon sensing contaminated hydrogen, a controller configured
